about_the_game:
Founders' Legacy is a relaxing idle-colony builder designed to sit at the bottom of your screen, letting you focus on other activities while growing and managing your settlement!

Build your colony:

Start with a simple tent and grow your settlement into a flourishing town, eventually constructing a majestic castle. Place structures, manage resources, and guide settlers as they build their lives and expand your colony.

Manage resources:

From crops and wood to stone and coins, every resource plays a vital role. Balance your stocks, unlock new upgrades, and ensure your colony thrives with careful planning.

Progress and prestige:

Unlock new possibilities with every cycle of growth. Prestige allows you to reset your settlement, gaining bonuses that make your next colony more efficient and prosperous.

Multitasking made easy:

Founders' Legacy is designed to sit quietly at the bottom of your screen, allowing you to watch videos, browse the internet, write, or play other games while your colony thrives in the background. Zoom in for details or zoom out for a minimalist, distraction-free view.

Endless discovery:
Expand your colony, uncover mysteries of the past, and make decisions that shape your settlement’s story. Each playthrough offers new challenges and opportunities to create a legacy that endures.

Whether you're taking a break, multitasking, or diving deep into the details, Founders' Legacy offers a tranquil yet engaging experience tailored to your pace.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB) or equivalent
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
